content: original japanese name コットンで編むポーチ１-１ *kotton de amu pōchi* direct link to pattern pdf 1 or from the pattern page scroll down to the wallet/pouch and click on the pdf icon underneath the photo pattern is entirely in japanese but charted using standard crochet symbols no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 5/0 - 6/0 3 0 - 3 5 mm hook recommended yarn is clover caribbean cotton 100% 2 it s also called コットン糸 中 *clover cotton medium * in the pattern yarn requirements * color 1 35 g approx 70 meters/ 76 55 yards * color 2 35 g approx 70 meters/ 76 55 yards * color 3 2 g approx 4 meters/ 4 37 yards 1 http //www clover co jp/cgi-bin/link_cnt/link_cnt cgi cnt=383 2 http //www clover co jp/kyan/knit/zakka/shouhin_l shtml
